component.text: Synchronous dynamic RAM (SDRAM) used for holding the running configuration and routing tables, and for supporting packet buffering.
Nonvolatile RAM (NVRAM) and boot flash memory used for storing the ROMMON boot code as well as NVRAM data.
Click the buttons to change the router view. Roll over highlighted components to view more information.
Advanced Integration Module (AIM) option that offloads processor-intensive functions such as encryption from the main CPU.
Shield for WAN interface card WIC or high-speed WIC (HWIC)
Shield for WAN interface card WIC or high-speed WIC (HWICI)
Flash memory used for storing the software image, configuration files, and log files. Flash memory for the 1841 is implemented in an external CompactFlash memory card.
